A Story to Tell

A Difference to Make.

A Difference Maker, A Caregiver

Driven by her faith and empowered by her love of people, Barb knows firsthand of the hardships health issues put on patients and the ones they love. She also knows that having the support you need makes all the difference. Marybeth’s Cottage will be the hands and hearts that ease the mental, physical, spiritual, and emotional stress these people are experiencing. We WILL make tomorrow better than today for our guest!

Barb Waite

Founder

Barb & Marybeth Waite - 2010

An exception to most every rule, this treasure of a soul experienced more hurdles and hardships in her short 24 years than those who live well into their twilight years. Although appearing to have the perverbile deck stacked against her she passionately, bravely, and lovingly made a difference...
